rows.label: tlk45320124_03_msg0001
rows.name:
The refugees from Acedia and Superbia are staying at this Trigo
Relay Station for the time being.

rows.label: tlk45320124_03_msg0002
rows.name:
Large numbers of them turning up in
Trigo would only end up causing
trouble. And that we don't need!

rows.label: tlk45320124_03_msg0003
rows.name:
They all seem to be holding up well,
though.
